sentences.sentence: Let us at least see our courts make an example of these despicable criminals.
sentences.translation: 让我们至少看到我们的法庭严惩卑鄙的罪犯们以示儆戒。

sentences.sentence: What was truly despicable was the deafening silence maintained by the candidates concerning the riots.
sentences.translation: 真正可鄙的是这些侯选人对暴乱所持的缄默态度。
